name: Linda Flynt
who_you_serve: Her services are aimed at coaches and business owners looking to enhance their client attraction strategies and grow their practices.
what_you_do: Linda Flynt provides a platform for coaches and business owners to access valuable tools, resources, and training to help them attract clients and grow their coaching businesses.
